Title: Relates to requirements of developers of offshore wind renewable energy projects receiving state financial support for such projects
Summary: Requires developers of offshore wind renewable energy projects receiving state financial support for such projects to use New York-based manufacturers that have labor peace agreements with employees, ensuring uninterrupted supply of equipment for such projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง66-p, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requirements of developers of offshore wind renewable energy projects receiving state financial support for such projects
